mapper.select: SELECT ATC_NUM, ATC_TITLE, ATC_CONTENT, ATC_WRITER, ATC_ACTIVATED, CTG_ID, ATC_REG_DATE, ATC_UPT_DATE FROM TB_ARTICLE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ARTICLE A, TB_ARTICLE_CTG B, TB_MEM C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CTG_ID = B.CTG_ID AND A.ATC_WRITER = C.MEM_ID AND B.CTG_ID = #{category}

SELECT A.ATC_NUM, A.ATC_TITLE, A.ATC_CONTENT, B.MEM_NICKNAME ATC_WRITER, B.MEM_ID, A.ATC_ACTIVATED, C.CTG_TITLE, A.CTG_ID, A.ATC_REG_DATE, A.ATC_UPT_DATE, A.ATC_VIEWS FROM TB_ARTICLE A, TB_MEM B, TB_ARTICLE_CTG C WHERE 1=1 AND A.ATC_WRITER = B.MEM_ID AND A.CTG_ID = C.CTG_ID AND A.ATC_NUM = #{atcNum}

SELECT TO_NUMBER(A.ATC_NUM) ATC_NUM, A.ATC_TITLE, A.ATC_CONTENT, C.MEM_NICKNAME ATC_WRITER, C.MEM_ID, TO_CHAR(A.ATC_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ATC_REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.ATC_UPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ATC_UPT_DATE, A.ATC_VIEWS FROM TB_ARTICLE A, TB_ARTICLE_CTG B, (SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNAME FROM TB_MEM) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CTG_ID = B.CTG_ID AND A.ATC_WRITER = C.MEM_ID AND B.CTG_ID = #{category} AND A.ATC_ACTIVATED = 0
ORDER BY ATC_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ARTICLE (ATC_NUM, ATC_TITLE, ATC_CONTENT, ATC_WRITER, ATC_ACTIVATED, CTG_ID, ATC_REG_DATE, ATC_UPT_DATE) VALUES (#{atcNum}, #{atcTitle}, #{atcContent}, #{atcWriter}, 0, #{ctgId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
